meta.job_title: Voice and Collaboration Platform Design Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and oversee the development of voice/collaboration platforms, enterprise voice and video architecture, and modernization of cloud technology networks.
Develop and maintain the IT plan for delivering voice and video services across all lines of business.
Define and manage all voice and video service’s key performance indicator (KPI) metrics.
Participate in disaster recovery infrastructure planning, building, and testing.
Communicate architecture decisions, roadblocks, and timelines to stakeholders.
Serve as a technical mentor for staff through sharing knowledge and staff development.
Work collaboratively with IT leaders on strategic network services initiatives and policy improvements.
Participate in discussions with vendors and suppliers to resolve critical network issues and support implementation of new technologies.
Deliver continuous improvement plans and programs to improve system availability and performance.
Comply with all policies and standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative or business field (e.g., statistics, mathematics, engineering, computer science)
